segments.text: I notice the boy is reaching into the cookie jar, and it’s making me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined to get those cookies, even if he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re having fun, even if it’s a little risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll be mad when she finds out they took cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but it’s not as interesting as the kids sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to be proud of himself for getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching him, and it’s like they’re in their own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get in trouble, but it’s fun to watch them.
segments.speaker: PAR
